scripts.composer_remove: ssh asmi04s9_all@asmi04s9.beget.tech "cd crm.asmi-studio.ru/public_html && php8.1 composer.phar dumpauto"
scripts.composer_install: ssh asmi04s9_all@asmi04s9.beget.tech "cd crm.asmi-studio.ru/public_html && php8.1 composer.phar install"
scripts.composer_update: ssh asmi04s9_all@asmi04s9.beget.tech "cd crm.asmi-studio.ru/public_html && php8.1 composer.phar update"
scripts.migrate_rep: ssh asmi04s9_all@asmi04s9.beget.tech "cd crm.asmi-studio.ru/public_html && php8.1 artisan migrate"
scripts.rollback_rep: ssh asmi04s9_all@asmi04s9.beget.tech "cd crm.asmi-studio.ru/public_html && php8.1 artisan migrate:rollback"
scripts.seed_rep: ssh asmi04s9_all@asmi04s9.beget.tech "cd crm.asmi-studio.ru/public_html && php8.1 artisan DB:seed"
scripts.seed_rep_one: ssh asmi04s9_all@asmi04s9.beget.tech "cd crm.asmi-studio.ru/public_html && php8.1 artisan DB:seed AboutAndBonusSeeder"
scripts.db_update: npm run rollback_rep && npm run migrate_rep && npm run seed_rep
scripts.db_update_total: ssh asmi04s9_all@asmi04s9.beget.tech "cd crm.asmi-studio.ru/public_html && php8.1 artisan migrate:refresh --seed"
scripts.optimized_rep: ssh asmi04s9_all@asmi04s9.beget.tech "cd crm.asmi-studio.ru/public_html && php8.1 composer.phar update --optimize-autoloader --no-dev"
scripts.dump_autoload: ssh asmi04s9_all@asmi04s9.beget.tech "cd crm.asmi-studio.ru/public_html && php8.1 composer.phar dump-autoload"
scripts.storage_link: ssh asmi04s9_all@asmi04s9.beget.tech "cd crm.asmi-studio.ru/public_html && php8.1 artisan storage:link"
scripts.key_gen: ssh asmi04s9_all@asmi04s9.beget.tech "cd crm.asmi-studio.ru/public_html && php8.1 artisan key:generate"
scripts.cache_config: ssh asmi04s9_all@asmi04s9.beget.tech "cd crm.asmi-studio.ru/public_html && php8.1 artisan config:cache"
scripts.cache_route: ssh asmi04s9_all@asmi04s9.beget.tech "cd crm.asmi-studio.ru/public_html && php8.1 artisan route:cache"
scripts.cache_view: ssh asmi04s9_all@asmi04s9.beget.tech "cd crm.asmi-studio.ru/public_html && php8.1 artisan view:cache"
scripts.cache_clear: ssh asmi04s9_all@asmi04s9.beget.tech "cd crm.asmi-studio.ru/public_html && php8.1 artisan cache:clear"
scripts.optimize: ssh asmi04s9_all@asmi04s9.beget.tech "cd crm.asmi-studio.ru/public_html && php8.1 artisan optimize"
scripts.optimize_all: npm run optimize && npm run cache_clear && npm run cache_view && npm run cache_route && npm run cache_config
scripts.deploy_m: vite build && npm run send_vite_build && npm run pull_rep && npm run optimize_all
